mapper.select: SELECT a.ybh,b.rzname,b.rzsex,b.rzcsrq,b.rzhyzk,b.rzzzmm,b.rzxl,c.rsj,b.rzgzjl,a.ygzt FROM yuangongbiao a INNER JOIN rencaizibiao b on a.rzbh=b.rzbh INNER JOIN rencaibiao c on a.rzbh=c.rzbh WHERE b.rzname like "%" #{rzname} "%" and ygzt!=5 and ygzt!=1 and ygzt!=4

SELECT a.ybh,b.rzname,b.rzsex,b.rzcsrq,b.rzhyzk,b.rzzzmm,b.rzxl,c.rsj,b.rzgzjl,a.ygzt FROM yuangongbiao a INNER JOIN rencaizibiao b on a.rzbh=b.rzbh INNER JOIN rencaibiao c on a.rzbh=c.rzbh WHERE b.rzname like "%" #{rzname} "%" and ygzt='5'

SELECT a.ybh,b.rzname,b.rzsex,b.rzcsrq,b.rzhyzk,b.rzzzmm,b.rzxl,c.rsj,b.rzgzjl,a.ygzt FROM yuangongbiao a INNER JOIN rencaizibiao b on a.rzbh=b.rzbh INNER JOIN rencaibiao c on a.rzbh=c.rzbh WHERE b.rzname like "%" #{rzname} "%" and ygzt='1'

SELECT a.ybh,b.rzname,b.rzsex,b.rzcsrq,b.rzhyzk,b.rzzzmm,b.rzxl,c.rsj,b.rzgzjl,a.ygzt FROM yuangongbiao a INNER JOIN rencaizibiao b on a.rzbh=b.rzbh INNER JOIN rencaibiao c on a.rzbh=c.rzbh WHERE b.rzname like "%" #{rzname} "%" and ygzt='4'
